titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to report on tax compliance with respect to non-employer business income, and for other purposes.
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to report on tax compliance with respect to non-employer business income, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to study and report to Congress regarding tax compliance with respect to non-employer business income. The report must include an evaluation of: (1) whether there is significant over-reporting of non-employer business income due to underutilization of allowable deductions and other tax benefits; (2) the current tax withholding, reporting, and filing systems; and (3) changes over time in the earning of wage income and non-employer business income.
